about_the_game:
This Guitar Hero/Tap Tap Revenge] like game extends your music enjoyment to another sense: touch by challenging users to show their skill and music perception. now we are available on Steam.

- Feel the music with your hands: tap the notes as it passes scoring areas
- Updated list of songs of different genres: the list of songs is chosen and updated continuously. Right now we are featuring songs from big artists such as The Chainsmokers, Alan Walker, Calvin Harris, Martin Garrix, Bruno Mars, twenty one pilots, The Weeknd, Armin Van Buuren, John Legend, Sia, Maroon 5...etc.

Join us and send the suggestion of your favourite songs and artists.
detailed_description:
This Guitar Hero/Tap Tap Revenge] like game extends your music enjoyment to another sense: touch by challenging users to show their skill and music perception. now we are available on Steam.

- Feel the music with your hands: tap the notes as it passes scoring areas
- Updated list of songs of different genres: the list of songs is chosen and updated continuously. Right now we are featuring songs from big artists such as The Chainsmokers, Alan Walker, Calvin Harris, Martin Garrix, Bruno Mars, twenty one pilots, The Weeknd, Armin Van Buuren, John Legend, Sia, Maroon 5...etc.

Join us and send the suggestion of your favourite songs and artists.
name: SShield Reborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 ~3.9GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
